content: note - free download is in english only ***from the knit rowan website *** knit this pretty round neck cardigan from little rowan cherish designed by linda whaley in summerlite 4ply its all over lace pattern and picot edge make it suitable for the knitter with some experience **finished width dimensions ** *at underarm * 22 23 24 25 5 26 27 cm 8½ 9 9½ 10 10 10½ inches **yarn information ** *cardigan with contrast trim photographed with rowan summerlite 4ply* a - duck egg 419 1 2 2 2 2 3 skeins 191 382 382 382 382 573 yards b - pure white 417 1 1 1 1 1 1 skeins 191 191 191 191 191 191 yards *solid cardigan photographed with rowan summerlite 4ply in pure white* 1 2 2 2 2 3 skeins 191 382 382 382 382 573 yards **extras ** qty 4 4 5 5 6 6 10mm buttons
